METHOD.NAME: ListaItensErro
METHOD.ACTIONSCRIPT: SELECT LG.EBL_INTEGRACAO AS INTEGRACAO, IT.EBL_DESCRICAO AS DESCRICAO, LG.EBL_DATA_INICIO AS DATA_INICIO, LG.EBL_DATA_FINAL AS DATA_FINAL, #NULL_TO_Z(LG.EBL_REGISTROS_PROCESSADOS) AS REGISTROS_PROCESSADOS, LG.EBL_TRANS_ID AS TRANS_ID, LG.EBL_STATUS_ULTIMO_PROCESSO AS STATUS_ULTIMO_PROCESSO, LG.EBL_LOG FROM EBL_LOGS LG INNER JOIN EBL_INTEGRACOES IT ON IT.EBL_INTEGRACAO=LG.EBL_INTEGRACAO WHERE [LG.EBL_INTEGRACAO=:INTEGRACAO] [AND CAST(#MONTH(LG.EBL_DATA_INICIO)||"/"||#DAY(LG.EBL_DATA_INICIO)||"/"||#YEAR(LG.EBL_DATA_INICIO) AS DATE)=:DATA] ORDER BY LG.EBL_INTEGRACAO,LG.EBL_DATA_INICIO
